Skill.name: Cover
Skill.description: Cover an ally for 3 turns, taking their physical damage

Skill.name: Light of Judgement
Skill.description: Unleash a wave of light on your enemies

Skill.name: Lay on Hands
Skill.description: Heal your ally with warm light

Skill.name: Smite
Skill.description: Burn your enemy with divine light

Skill.name: Prominence
Skill.description: Burn an enemy and reduce 1 Skill cooldown by 1 turn

Skill.name: Guardian
Skill.description: Soak all an allies damage for 2 turns

Skill.name: Angelic Pride
Skill.description: Heal your allies and burn your enemies with divine light

Skill.name: Justice
Skill.description: Take all damage for the party 1 turn

Skill.name: Congregate
Skill.description: Heal all allies X times where X is the number of current enemies

Skill.name: Godly Chorus
Skill.description: If this ability kills an enemy, gain life equal to the damage dealt

Skill.name: Pax Caelestis
Skill.description: Unleash divine blessings and cure allies of Zombie and Darkness whilst burning your foes

Skill.name: MASTERY - Angiris Praesidio
Skill.description: Reduce party damage by 90% for 1 turn

Skill.name: MASTERY - Custode Numine
Skill.description: For 3 turns, your HP cannot go below 1

Skill.name: MASTERY - Ultima Verbi
Skill.description: Offer up your life to raise an ally
